message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Thanks for your interest, Bob. I understand your position, but $60 is too low for me. Could you consider $100?
I'm still interested in the product, but $100 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $70?
Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. How about we split the difference and settle at $85? This feels like a fair compromise.
I'm getting close to my budget, but $85 is still a bit too high. Would you be willing to meet me at $80?
